tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ReturnsExchanges (
  return_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id UUID,
  return_reason TEXT,
  return_date TIMESTAMP,
  exchange_requested BOOLEAN
);
CREATE TABLE Returns ( return_id INT PRIMARY KEY, product_id INT NOT NULL, reason TEXT, return_date DATE );
CREATE TABLE Exchanges ( exchange_id INT PRIMARY KEY, old_product_id INT NOT NULL, new_product_id INT NOT NULL, exchange_date DATE );
CREATE TABLE Users ( user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, first_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, last_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, address TEXT );

CREATE TABLE Exchanges (
  exchange_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  original_product_id INT,
  exchanged_product_id INT,
  exchange_reason TEXT,
  exchange_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Returns (
  return_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT,
  return_reason TEXT,
  return_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Exchanges (
  exchange_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT,
  exchange_reason TEXT,
  exchange_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE DefectiveProducts (
  product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name TEXT,
  description TEXT,
  defect_reason TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE UnwantedProducts (
  product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name TEXT,
  description TEXT,
  return_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username TEXT,
  email TEXT,
  address TEXT
)
